divs: sighting detailslarge? rectangle over my house 12 miles from white house. i stepped out of my rear door ( faces due south, 180o) at 19:00 hours and looked up at about 45o, saw 2 lines of lights flashing, appeared to be on an object (it was dark). it is hard to judge size because the lights are receding to the south and i had not seen it directly overhead. the base leg to reagan nat. airport is directly in front of my house, if i were to use a 757 at 3000 feet to guess the size i would guess it to be wider than and longer than the 757. there were 6 lights directly in line on each side flashing they were white. the didn't flash like an aircraft but were on for a second and off for an instant) as it was dark it was hard to guess size and speed. there was no noise. i saw this 12 miles from the white house. 2 helicopters showed up from the north a minute\maybe two later they continued south for several miles and then circled back where they joined almost over my house. they slowed to almost a hover and then continued on to the north. these craft (choppers and ufo) flew 90o across the base leg of regan airport at 7pm with planes landing at less than 1 min. intervals. (although i only saw lights, in that they never changed their relationship to each other i call it a craft) as i looked at it i had guessed the size to be maybe as big as a football field traveling at 20 to 30 mph, what made no sense to me was that the choppers did not close on it even though they were doing at least 100 mph. this sighting was constantly on my mind for over a year trying to figure out some of the things that didn't add up until one day i stepped out to look up to see a cloud formation in the sky that cleared all the questions that i had. i now believe that the object was a mile or more sq\rect.. and that it flew directly over the pentagon at 35 to 50 thousand feet which would increase it's speed to well over that of the choppers. i am seventy two years old, i had a background with aircraft in the army (choppers and fixed wing). i live under the landing pattern of reagan national and see planes landing at dulles to the west of me for 45 years. i am not prone to seeing "things".
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Vienna
There were no other sightings in Vienna on or around February 16th 2007
